entry.title: Flood Warning issued March 31 at 12:41AM CDT until April 05 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Wisconsin... Wolf River near Shiocton affecting Shawano, Outagamie and Waupaca Counties. For the Lower Wolf River...including Shiocton...Minor flooding is forecast.

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued March 31 at 10:30AM EDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...SHOWERS WITH GUSTY WIND WILL IMPACT EASTERN PLEASANTS...CENTRAL RITCHIE...NORTHEASTERN WIRT AND TYLER COUNTIES THROUGH 1100 AM EDT...
